label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_001
content:
## 2026-01-03 Daily Operations Summary

### Metrics

- AXFR Success Percentage: 95.2
- IXFR Requests: 188
- IXFR Success Percentage: 98.9
- Transfer Average (ms): 612
- Transfer P95 (ms): 1440
- TSIG Failures: 2

#### TTL Changes

- Zones Touched: 7

### Infrastructure
#### bind-master-01
- CPU Percentage: 38
- Memory Percentage: 62
- Disk Used Percentage: 71
- Net In (Mbps): 84
- Net Out (Mbps): 112
- Open Files: 1240
- NTP Offset (ms): 3

#### bind-slave-02
- CPU Percentage: 22
- Memory Percentage: 49
- Disk Used Percentage: 54
- Net In (Mbps): 61
- Net Out (Mbps): 75
- Open Files: 980
- NTP Offset (ms): 4

#### cloud-dns-sync-01
- CPU Percentage: 57
- Memory Percentage: 68
- Disk Used Percentage: 46
- Net In (Mbps): 95
- Net Out (Mbps): 130
- Queue Depth: 7
- NTP Offset (ms): 2

#### signer-01
- CPU Percentage: 44
- Memory Percentage: 73
- Disk Used Percentage: 58
- Net In (Mbps): 18
- Net Out (Mbps): 20
- HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 52
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

### Events
- Planned cutover: enabled cloud-managed secondary for 12 pilot zones; verified NS sets and SOA serial increments.
- Detected intermittent SOA serial mismatch on 3 zones due to delayed IXFR application on bind-slave-02; forced retransfer using AXFR.
- TTL reduction rollout for api.example.com records (3600->300) completed for 5 zones; one rollback after stakeholder flagged increased upstream query volume.
- DNSSEC signer queue briefly backed up after KSK rollover simulation; cleared by increasing signer worker threads from 4 to 6.

### On Call
- Shift: R. Patel
- Pages: 3
- Tickets: 7
- Status: Stable after minor transfer remediation; monitoring propagation and DNSSEC validations.
